title: Latin
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20130922161839/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : Latin**

1. A language first spoken by the Latins in ancient Italy. Associated with the rise of the city of Rome and its later empire.

2. A reference to peoples of Central and South America, their languages, and their cultures.

3. A term for languages that use the [Roman Alphabet](http://web.archive.org/web/20130922161839/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Roman%20Alphabet).

4. A style of [serif](http://web.archive.org/web/20130922161839/http:/typophile.com/wiki/serif), namely, ones of the triangular, pointed variety.
author: dan_reynolds
